title: More Bad News in Britain: Premier Devo Team of Pidcock, Healy, Blevins to Shut Road Division
content:
Trinity Racing – Britain's answer to Hagen Bermans Axeon – strips back operations due to funding squeeze in latest blow to struggling scene.

Read the full article at More Bad News in Britain: Premier Devo Team of Pidcock, Healy, Blevins to Shut Road Division on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
